request.description:
### Update User Details

This endpoint allows the client to update the details of a specific user.

#### Request Body

- `email` (string): The email address of the user.
    
- `name` (string): The name of the user.
    
- `role` (string): The role of the user.
    

#### Response

- `success` (boolean): Indicates if the request was successful.
    
- `message` (string): A message related to the request.
    
- `data` (object): An object containing the updated user details.
    
    - `id` (string): The unique identifier of the user.
        
    - `email` (string): The email address of the user.
        
    - `name` (string): The name of the user.
        
    - `role` (string): The role of the user.
        
    - `createdAt` (string): The timestamp of when the user was created.
        
    - `updatedAt` (string): The timestamp of when the user was last updated.

### Get Attendance Data

This endpoint retrieves the attendance data for all users.

**Request Body**  
This request does not require a request body.

**Response**

- `success` (boolean): Indicates if the request was successful.
    
- `message` (string): A message related to the request.
    
- `data` (array): An array of objects containing the following attendance information:
    
    - `id` (string): The ID of the attendance record.
        
    - `userId` (string): The ID of the user associated with the attendance record.
        
    - `user` (object): An object containing user information including name, email, and role.
        
    - `date` (string): The date of the attendance record.
        
    - `checkInTime` (string): The time when the user checked in.
        
    - `checkOutTime` (string): The time when the user checked out, if available.
        
    - `checkInPhotoUrl` (string): The URL of the photo taken during check-in.
        
    - `checkOutPhotoUrl` (string): The URL of the photo taken during check-out, if available.
        
    - `createdAt` (string): The timestamp of when the record was created.
        
    - `updatedAt` (string): The timestamp of when the record was last updated.
        

**Example Response**

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": "",
            "userId": "",
            "date": "",
            "checkInTime": "",
            "checkOutTime": null,
            "checkInPhotoUrl": "",
            "checkOutPhotoUrl": null,
            "createdAt": "",
            "updatedAt": ""
        }
    ]
}

 ```

request.description:
# Attendance Check-In

This endpoint is used to check in for attendance.

### Request Body

- `photo` (file): A photo of the attendance check-in.
    

### Response

- Status: 400
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

#### Success Response

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "",
    "data": {
        "id": "",
        "userId": "",
        "date": "",
        "checkInTime": "",
        "checkOutTime": null,
        "checkInPhotoUrl": "",
        "checkOutPhotoUrl": null,
        "createdAt": "",
        "updatedAt": ""
    }
}

 ```

### Attendance Check-Out

This endpoint allows the user to check out from their attendance by providing a photo.

#### Request Body

- `photo` (file): A photo of the user for attendance check-out.
    

#### Response

- Status: 400
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

Example Response:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "",
    "data": {
        "id": "",
        "userId": "",
        "date": "",
        "checkInTime": "",
        "checkOutTime": "",
        "checkInPhotoUrl": "",
        "checkOutPhotoUrl": "",
        "createdAt": "",
        "updatedAt": ""
    }
}

 ```

### Get Attendance History

This endpoint retrieves the attendance history for all users.

#### Request Body

This request does not require a request body.

#### Response

- `success` (boolean): Indicates if the request was successful.
    
- `message` (string): An optional message from the server.
    
- `data` (array): An array of attendance history objects, each containing the following fields:
    
    - `id` (string): The unique identifier for the attendance record.
        
    - `userId` (string): The ID of the user associated with the attendance record.
        
    - `date` (string): The date of the attendance record.
        
    - `checkInTime` (string): The time when the user checked in.
        
    - `checkOutTime` (string): The time when the user checked out, or null if the user has not checked out yet.
        
    - `checkInPhotoUrl` (string): The URL of the photo taken during check-in.
        
    - `checkOutPhotoUrl` (string): The URL of the photo taken during check-out, or null if the user has not checked out yet.
        
    - `createdAt` (string): The timestamp when the attendance record was created.
        
    - `updatedAt` (string): The timestamp when the attendance record was last updated.
        

#### Example

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": "",
            "userId": "",
            "date": "",
            "checkInTime": "",
            "checkOutTime": null,
            "checkInPhotoUrl": "",
            "checkOutPhotoUrl": null,
            "createdAt": "",
            "updatedAt": ""
        }
    ]
}

 ```
